purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe a joint created during the interconnect substrate manufacturing process. The joint purpose is to describe an intended connection between the interconnect substrate materials. The joint concept may be for strictly design or analysis purposes and may not be resolvable as a separate feature in the finished product.
